name: Monsters vs. Aliens: The Videogame
description:
Monsters vs. Aliens: The Videogame is an arcade game developed by Beenox Studios. It was originally released in 2009. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Monsters vs. Aliens: The Videogame on PlayStation 3, PC and PlayStation 2.
